str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 1st Person Singular
str2: Prop: I fasten to; I lay hold of, touch, know carnally. Reflexive of hapto; properly, to attach oneself to, i.e. To touch.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A long flowing outer garment, tunic. Neuter of a presumed derivative of ennumi; a dress.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 1st Person Singular
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
